required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Substance Abuse Treatment to HIV Care II (SAT2HIV-II) Project
clinical_study.official_title: The Substance Abuse Treatment to HIV Care II (SAT2HIV-II) Project

brief_summary.textblock: An experiment to test the effectiveness of providing monetary bonuses to staff for achieving pre-defined performance targets regarding the implementation of a motivational interviewing-based brief intervention for substance use.

detailed_description.textblock: A cluster-randomized type 3 hybrid trial with HIV service organizations across the United States. The primary aims is to test the effectiveness of an innovative pay-for-performance (P4P) strategy for improving the implementation of a motivational interviewing-based brief intervention for substance use.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at the end of month 12
primary_outcome.description: The cumulative number of brief interventions that each staff participant implemented during the implementation phase.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at the end of month 12
primary_outcome.description: The cumulative sum quality score that each staff participant demonstrated during the implementation phase.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at 4-weeks from the baseline assessment
secondary_outcome.description: The number of days clients used their primary substance (i.e., the substance the client identified a willingness to talk about during the MIBI) during the past 28 day

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed at 4-weeks from the baseline assessment
secondary_outcome.description: The sum of the 7 items including in the Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item (GAD-7), which ranges from 0 to 21 and where higher scores mean a worse outcome.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Training, Feedback, Consultation, Facilitation, and P4P
arm_group.description: An enhanced version of the multilevel implementation strategy

intervention.intervention_name: The facilitation, training, feedback, and consultation (FTFC) Strategy
intervention.description: A multilevel implementation strategy that includes team-focused facilitation, as well as staff-focused training, feedback, and consultation

intervention.intervention_name: The facilitation, training, feedback, consultation, and pay-for-performance (FTFC+PFP) Strategy
intervention.description: A multilevel implementation strategy that includes team-focused facilitation, as well as staff-focused training, feedback, consultation, and pay-for-performance.
intervention.arm_group_label: Training, Feedback, Consultation, Facilitation, and P4P

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Inclusion criteria for staff participants:
- 18+ years of age
Inclusion criteria for client participants:
- 18+ years of age
- Diagnosed with HIV
Exclusion Criteria:
- Exclusion criteria for staff participants:
- None
Exclusion criteria for client participants:
* None

patient_data.ipd_description: After deidentification, all of the individual participant data collected during the trial.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Anyone who wishes to access the data.
